technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not disclose any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant disclosed some negative affect about the pandemic when recalling the past, mentioning feeling concerned and scared for the people affected.
communal_orientation: The participant displayed some behaviors and made statements that reflect a desire for social connectedness with their conversation partner, asking questions and listening attentively.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation, throwing themselves into the discussion and genuinely conversing with their partner.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.

questions.transcript: And did you get any subsequent booster shots?

vaccine_importance: The participant did not explicitly state their belief about the importance of vaccines at the end of the conversation.
booster_importance: The participant did not explicitly state their belief about the importance of boosters at the end of the conversation.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity, considering different perspectives and recognizing nuance in the conversation.
general_notes: The participant seemed to be very open and willing to share their experiences and perspectives on the pandemic and vaccines.
